prompts.prompt: Retrieve all overdue tasks from the specified task list. Highlight the most critical ones based on due dates and importance.

template.name: overdue-tasks
template.title: Overdue tasks
template.description: Fetches overdue tasks from a specific task list and prioritizes them based on urgency and importance.

arguments.name: taskListId
arguments.description: The unique ID of the task list to retrieve overdue tasks from.

arguments.name: maxTasks
arguments.description: The maximum number of overdue tasks to retrieve.

arguments.name: dueDateThreshold
arguments.description: ISO 8601 formatted date-time (e.g., '2024-03-16T00:00:00Z'). Tasks with due dates before this will be considered overdue.

prompts.prompt:
Create a weekly summary of my Microsoft To-Do tasks, including:
- Total tasks completed this week
- Total tasks still pending
- Tasks categorized by priority (high, medium, low)
- Tasks categorized by due date (overdue, due this week, due next week)
- Recommendations for improving task management based on completion trends

Present the summary in a structured report format with actionable insights.

template.name: weekly-task-summary
template.title: Weekly task summary
template.description: Generates a weekly summary of tasks from Microsoft To-Do

prompts.prompt:
Analyze my Microsoft To-Do tasks and provide prioritization insights:
- Identify tasks marked as 'Important' but not completed
- Highlight overdue tasks that are still pending
- Suggest tasks that can be delegated based on category or assigned user
- Recommend a priority order for pending tasks based on due dates and importance

Present the output in a clear, actionable list with explanations for each recommendation.

template.name: task-prioritization-insights
template.title: Task prioritization insights
template.description: Provides prioritization insights for Microsoft To-Do tasks

prompts.prompt:
Analyze my task completion trends in Microsoft To-Do over the last month and generate a report that includes:
- Total tasks completed each week
- Average time taken to complete tasks (from creation to completion)
- Categories or labels for the most frequently completed tasks
- Days of the week with peak task completion activity
- Recommendations for improving task completion efficiency

Provide the insights in a structured format with graphs or tables where applicable.

template.name: task-completion-trends
template.title: Task completion trends
template.description: Analyzes task completion trends and provides actionable insights

prompts.prompt:
Identify all overdue tasks from my Microsoft To-Do lists and create a summary including:
- Task titles and due dates
- Tasks sorted by priority (high to low)
- Any assigned collaborators for shared tasks
- Recommendations for addressing overdue tasks

Summarize the findings in a list format and include a suggested action plan.

template.name: overdue-task-notification
template.title: Overdue task notification
template.description: Generates a summary of all overdue tasks in Microsoft To-Do

prompts.prompt:
Create a task delegation report from my Microsoft To-Do lists that includes:
- Tasks that are assigned to collaborators
- Tasks that are suitable for delegation based on priority and due date
- Tasks without assigned users
- Suggestions for delegation based on workload and task type

Present the report in a structured format with actionable recommendations.

template.name: task-delegation-report
template.title: Task delegation report
template.description: Generates a report on task delegation and provides suggestions for improving workload distribution
